name: Type I/II Filter
description: Ensures corners are of TypeI or TypeII. For initial corners this means gcd(a b) > 1.

name: Edge Filter
description: Ensures corner is final (TypeI) or has an edge.

name: Child Filter
description: Ensures corner has an edge end that leads to a child corner.

name: Chain Filter
description: Ensures corner has an edge that eventually leads to a Type 1 corner (so it is part of a closed chain).

name: mn Chain Filter
description: Ensures corner is part of a chain which has a valid mn family

name: Divisibility Chain Filter
description: Ensures corner is part of a chain which has a valid mn family and satisfies divisibility conditions.
